@DrJBhattacharya @MikkoPackalen How about an evidence based systematic review rather than an essay? Of course contact tracing is futile in some circumstances and perhaps it is for all outbreaks of omicron. But for Delta when cases were low,  show me the data that proves it was futile in New Zealand.

@DrJBhattacharya @RealDeniseWelch Ridiculous to say that contact tracing was a futile exercise. It depends on the context. In New Zealand it was a cornerstone of mimimising spread when cases were low. Without it our Delta outbreak would have claimed many more lives. By all means try and prove your point.

@0rac13Seer You say it stands the test of time? How long is that test in your opinion. I was born in '70. Back then it was all about an impending and immediate Ice Age. When following science, it's also incumbent on you to follow the money along with it.
